posts.title: Development Update - Continuing Without Modularization
posts.author: Ivy Mycelia
content: After attempting to split up and modularize eval.c, I've found that properly linking everything together is proving more challenging than expected. For now, I'll be continuing Myco development without the modularization approach.

Currently working on getting memory management to be completely working and safe. This includes proper memory allocation, deallocation, and ensuring there are no memory leaks or unsafe memory access patterns.
The focus is on stability and reliability rather than code organization for the time being.

posts.title: Codebase Refactor - Splitting Up eval.c
posts.author: Ivy Mycelia
content: I've been working on refactoring the codebase to make it more modular and easier to maintain. I've split up eval.c into multiple files, and I'm currently working on bringing Myco back to full functionality.
Once I've finished this refactor, I'll begin working on v1.7.x.

posts.title: Welcome to the Myco Community
posts.author: Ivy Mycelia
content: Welcome to the Myco programming language community! This is where you'll find the latest updates on development progress, new features, and community discussions.
Feel free to join our Discord server to connect with other developers and stay updated on all things Myco!
